title: MLB Madness
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss if the San Diego Padres’ series against the Dodgers is significant, how many games the Braves need to win against the Mets in their five game series and if the Rams should be cautious or concerned about Mathew Stafford’s elbow.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: PTI: Big MLB series are starting on both coasts and should the Rams be concerned about Mathew Stafford?
